WorkItem.Description:
Using 'develop' branch (at the moment 592e0738c362 is the last commit).

__bin/tsc --version__
Version 0.9.1.0
Syntax:   tsc [options] [file ..]
... rest of the help text ...

Previously --version flag used to dump version without help text. It's confusing and unnecessary to dump help text over the version number, and makes it hard to __both__ consume the version __from scripts__ as well as __with a human eye.__

Comments.Message: Reason closed = Postponed (Won't fix for v1) -- does this mean it will get fixed sometime __after__ v1 ???
We will look at all postponed bugs after we ship V1 and prioritize, taking into account new features etc.
